title: Rjakash
author: Rjakash
content: A few days ago, Elon Musk responded to a friend's tweet saying that the price of BTC may increase by the end of winter.  He also asked everyone to be patient.  It means that the future of BTCL is very bright and its price will increase.  We are all waiting for this winter to end and the market to return to its previous form.  InshaAllah the price of BTC and digital currency will return to the previous room thanks

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: You should have attached his tweet with your post to make it more interesting.  But that is needless to say although names of such has a huge impact with demand-based assets such as cryptocurrencies or Bitcoin to be more specific. Anyone can say the same thing but only few could really put weigh on such statement. As he have mentioned, Bitcoin will but don't expect for an instant increase. On its application, those who could wait should hold because there might be months more before we see a clear sign of recovery. But at the end of the day, elon musk does not carry the fate of this industry, things might change so you choose what to do.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Rjakash on November 21, 2022, 12:36:28 PMA few days ago, Elon Musk responded to a friend's tweet saying that the price of BTC may increase by the end of winter.  He also asked everyone to be patient.  It means that the future of BTCL is very bright and its price will increase.  We are all waiting for this winter to end and the market to return to its previous form.  InshaAllah the price of BTC and digital currency will return to the previous room thanksUnless you post the Twitter link of Elon Musk, people like me will just treat this as speculation or fake news besides the market has been through a lot remember the pre-pandemic when Bitcoin almost crash to $5k, we all thought its the end but look at the market a few months ago before the FTX fiasco, the problem is with the centralized exchange Bitcoin is still Bitcoin and adoption still continues.You just have to believe it, if you have a hard time then go here and read https://99bitcoins.com/bitcoin-obituaries.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: No link to the elon's tweet = hoax. I guess that we didn't know when the time for crypto to increase again. Elon was just only trying to shill his investment if he was doing it before. Since you didn't even mention the link to the tweet and so many people will consider what you have been saying above was liar. I think that you shall also aware about this too. People didn't even know about what would be the exact time for the bullish trend to come. There's no ETA for when winter will be ended too. You shall not rely with anything that being said by influencer. that they have said about that was not actually true. they have their own agenda in what they have been saying,

comments.author: glendall
comments.body: This news should be given an accurate link so that it can be reviewed by everyone and can be said to be a real public assumption, not fake news.fear that it will cause negative effects if bitcoin does not up  later, stay careful in investing at this time because world finances are not doing well and don't force yourself to own if you are afraid of losing

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: I hope that Bitcoin will increase in price, but it seems so bleak with what's happening right now. It would decrease first and then rebound when it reaches the support level of around the $14k range. I think it's best to be positive, but it doesn't seem so. It's hard to predict what will happen with the market, but make sure you can do what you can afford to lose.

comments.author: crunck
comments.body: Quote from: Rjakash on November 21, 2022, 12:36:28 PMA few days ago, Elon Musk responded to a friend's tweet saying that the price of BTC may increase by the end of winter.  He also asked everyone to be patient.  It means that the future of BTCL is very bright and its price will increase.  We are all waiting for this winter to end and the market to return to its previous form.  InshaAllah the price of BTC and digital currency will return to the previous room thanksYou need to add a link to confirm your information is correct. I also follow his twitter but I have never seen him mention bitcoin price or say when this crypto winter will end. But in the end it's his prediction, just like us and there's no guarantee he's right.

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: I checked Elon Musk's profile on Twitter but I can't find the tweet do you have the source so we can see and it's not just bullshit from your mouth?Everyone expects bitcoin to rise again but I'm not sure in winter it will come true, we know Elon Musk may have a bit of influence on his statement but this doesn't break any bitcoin price so I assume that Elon musk didn't say that.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: For many years Bitcoin was able to get up and bounce back we all worried during the pandemic if that was the end but the market manage to get back and set a new all-time high, even before the pandemic Bitcoin always bounce back even without Elon Musk, it will bounce back we don't have to post fake news like this Elon tweet, the major players in the industry like CZ will do their best to get the market to rebound.

comments.author: super bako
comments.body: the situation is bad in crypto problems everywhere are happening. Elon Musk's tweets haven't been strong enough to make bitcoin support go up the next day. even though he supports altcoins but we have to look at the situation and don't be careless to walk freely now, I think bitcoin still has the potential to go down again

comments.author: Tony116
comments.body: Quote from: Rjakash on November 21, 2022, 12:36:28 PMA few days ago, Elon Musk responded to a friend's tweet saying that the price of BTC may increase by the end of winter.  He also asked everyone to be patient.  It means that the future of BTCL is very bright and its price will increase.  We are all waiting for this winter to end and the market to return to its previous form.  InshaAllah the price of BTC and digital currency will return to the previous room thanksI didn't see him say that, did I miss it? Can you provide a reliable link? The truth is, no matter what he says, he is just like us, just making predictions, and there is no guarantee that the words he speaks will come to fruition. Bitcoin does not depend on anyone even the richest person in the world. As for the future of bitcoin, it will always be, always bright and everyone here knows and doesn't need someone to show us. And you need to know more that, Elon used to be a market manipulator for profit. Do your own research and make your own judgment. Don't take anyone's advice, this market has no one to trust.

comments.author: Balmain
comments.body: Quote from: Tony116 on November 21, 2022, 03:00:42 PMQuote from: Rjakash on November 21, 2022, 12:36:28 PMA few days ago, Elon Musk responded to a friend's tweet saying that the price of BTC may increase by the end of winter.  He also asked everyone to be patient.  It means that the future of BTCL is very bright and its price will increase.  We are all waiting for this winter to end and the market to return to its previous form.  InshaAllah the price of BTC and digital currency will return to the previous room thanksI didn't see him say that, did I miss it? Can you provide a reliable link? I searched for this tweet on Twitter but couldn't find it. I wish the OP had added that. Maybe Elon Musk may have deleted his tweet, he can tweet from time to time and then delete it.I think there is still time for the market to recover. The collapse of the FTX market, the crisis created by Luna, these created many problems in the markets in terms of liquidity. The bear market is good because it takes a long time because this cycle is needed to clean up dysfunctional projects. Although Elon Musk didn't just say it as a manipulator, it doesn't change that he is a Manipulator.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: ajiz138 on November 21, 2022, 02:40:37 PMI checked Elon Musk's profile on Twitter but I can't find the tweet do you have the source so we can see and it's not just bullshit from your mouth?Everyone expects bitcoin to rise again but I'm not sure in winter it will come true, we know Elon Musk may have a bit of influence on his statement but this doesn't break any bitcoin price so I assume that Elon musk didn't say that.Op seems desperate on the market condition that he is posting something that is not existing if he really tweets this it will go viral and the media will take it and it will be a big talk on Reddit and on telegram.Is it all about Elon Musk does this mean every depends on what Elon Musk is going to say or tweet, Elon Musk is not the only major player here he is a big whale but there are a lot of whales that if they combined their influence will have an impact in the market., so please stop using Elon Musk as if everything depends on him.

comments.author: rozak
comments.body: Quote from: Rjakash on November 21, 2022, 12:36:28 PMA few days ago, Elon Musk responded to a friend's tweet saying that the price of BTC may increase by the end of winter.  He also asked everyone to be patient.  It means that the future of BTCL is very bright and its price will increase.  We are all waiting for this winter to end and the market to return to its previous form.  InshaAllah the price of BTC and digital currency will return to the previous room thankssome people who still hold their BTC will of course think that way. this is not doomsday for BTC. we've seen how BTC was dumped several times. when the moment comes BTC will be back. everyone who trades and invests in BTC believes that, otherwise some would have left the market.maybe you can provide a copy of the link or screenshot of the tweet?

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: I am not sure which tweet you are referring to but these celebs have the habit of falsely pumping coins when they want to sell so they get the advantage of the pump and able to make a good profit by using their influence which costs nothing.I am not sure if there was a recent tweet because I am not a fan of these celebs and neither do I follow their words, but usually go against them - when they tell something is going big, I would sell it if I already own it.Do not fall in the trap of these celebs, they are here only for their own gains, not your gains.

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: Quote from: Rjakash on November 21, 2022, 12:36:28 PMA few days ago, Elon Musk responded to a friend's tweet saying that the price of BTC may increase by the end of winter.  He also asked everyone to be patient.  It means that the future of BTCL is very bright and its price will increase.  We are all waiting for this winter to end and the market to return to its previous form.  InshaAllah the price of BTC and digital currency will return to the previous room thanksIt would have been more interesting if you added the tweet link with your post.  But you didn't, after all Musk is a clever guy and he makes different comments from time to time.  But he has been tweeting a lot about Bitcoin DogeCoin and Shiba Inu since the beginning and continues to do so, this is not a new update for him but whether Elon Musk says it or not, Bitcoin will rise again but it may take several months but it will rise.  This has been seen in the past, but there was no Elon mask!

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: You shouldn't believe bitcoin's price will rise because of a statement from Elon Musk. You should expect bitcoin's price to rise because there is going to be a halving in 2024, which historically has always pumped bitcoin to expressive new price ranges when it happened in previous years. Halving is an important mark in bitcoin's history, as the rewards per mined block are decreased by half, so bitcoin becomes even more scarce and valuable for the market, consequently increasing its price. Celebrities like Musk know about this fact, but they don't exactly explain bitcoin is going to gain more traction because of it, as they don't want common people to think by themselves. They want to remain as middlemen between the audience and knowledge.

comments.author: Flexystar
comments.body: I don’t know, not the good source that I can really trust at this movement. Elon is all about hyping the market on his own convenience and getting some profits for his late night parties. Do you really think he is in the favour of such hikes? He just seeing if the market reacts to his tweets anymore or not so that he can book some under the table profits and Short the market afterwards. However, as everyone asked its hoax if it’s not with original tweet. If it would have been that Official then there would have been some news about it. That’s what happened when worlds richest man says something.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: He is not a soothsayer and should not feel like his words are the reason why btc price rises when it eventually does. We all know how the market operates, there is bull and bear period. Whether he says it will raise or not, it will when that period comes, he should not act like a price prediction genius.  And the irony is that, he is now the ceo of twitter which means he can literally type anything.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Quote from: Rjakash on November 21, 2022, 12:36:28 PMA few days ago, Elon Musk responded to a friend's tweet saying that the price of BTC may increase by the end of winter.  He also asked everyone to be patient.  It means that the future of BTCL is very bright and its price will increase.  We are all waiting for this winter to end and the market to return to its previous form.  InshaAllah the price of BTC and digital currency will return to the previous room thanksWell, that makes sense.If he said that it's by the end of the crypto winter. Then, that means that it's going to be done by the end of the bear market which obviously makes that bitcoin will literally going to increase by that time.The price of bitcoin for sure will have its moment back to the top again and while we're looking at it from the bottom now. Because the price has hit $15,700 again.
